task.title: Setting cluster metadata
task.shortdesc: Cluster services profiled with metadata can be more easily discovered and managed.

context.p: Enabling the metadata settings in Realm Permissions allows an administrator to view and edit metadata settings for the deployment. Adding metadata services available across the cluster to be efficiently discovered and invoked.

step.cmd: Under the Utilities section of the Console menu bar, click User Management.
On the user Management page, click the administrator who will be granted rights to apply object metadata.
Click View Metadata and Edit Metadata checkboxes to enable these settings.

stepresult.p: The Metadata Settings button becomes available under the Configuration section of the Console menu bar.

step.cmd: Apply metadata to the node objects.
step.info: From the Console menu bar, you can select the option to define custom metadata fields using the SetMetadataProperty variable.
